name: Memento Lens
description:
When you play a Weapon/Artifact/Location/Companion card: If you have played a card with the same name previously during this match, spend 2 less Elemental Dice to play it. (Once per Round)
Usage(s): 2
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When you play a {SPRITE_PRESET#3003}Weapon/{SPRITE_PRESET#3004}Artifact/{SPRITE_PRESET#3104}Location/{SPRITE_PRESET#3103}Companion card:</color> If you have played a card with the same name previously during this match, spend 2 less Elemental Dice to play it. (Once per Round)\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 2</color>
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When you play a {SPRITE_PRESET#3003}Weapon/{SPRITE_PRESET#3004}Artifact/{SPRITE_PRESET#3104}Location/{SPRITE_PRESET#3103}Companion card:</color> If you have played a card with the same name previously during this match, spend 2 less Elemental Dice to play it. (Once per Round)\n<color=#FFFFFFFF><color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>: 2</color>
storytext:
They say that in the distant past, the legendary Kitsune Saiguu left a catalyst for the then-Hiiragi Clan head, Hiroshi, as a tool to be used in exorcisms.
The Hiiragis would have a special Kamera made to order from overseas with that catalyst mounted on its lens assembly, before giving it back to the Grand Narukami Shrine as a symbol of their friendship.
